item.title: Inside the frantic White House switch on Inauguration Day
item.description: The residence staff has just hours to move the Bidens out and the Trumps in.

item.title: Trump inauguration live updates: Trump paints dark portrait, to send troops to border
item.description: Donald Trump took the presidential oath for a second time, capping a historic political comeback.

item.title: Trump's initial executive orders to include renaming Gulf of Mexico
item.description: During his January press conference at Mar-a-Lago, Trump declared he would change the name, saying it’s currently run by cartels and that "it’s ours."

item.title: Trump executive actions: plans to eliminate federal DEI, define gender
item.description: President Trump will order a "national energy emergency" and issue orders aimed at the elimination of federal DEI programs as part of a slew of execut...

item.title: WATCH: Donald Trump sworn in as 47th US president
item.description: Chief Justice John Roberts administered the presidential oath of office to Donald J. Trump.
